examples.example: 这次旅行我们一共去了五个美丽的城市，收获满满。

translate.english: We went to a total of five beautiful cities on this trip and gained a lot.

examples.example: 我和朋友们一共攒了一笔钱，准备去实现我们的梦想之旅。

translate.english: I and my friends have saved a sum of money together and are preparing to realize our dream journey.

examples.example: 我和同学们一共为贫困地区的孩子捐赠了许多书籍和文具。

translate.english: I and my classmates donated a lot of books and stationery to the children in the poverty-stricken areas altogether.
